SELECT KIND_OF_ACCIDENT_ID, KIND_OF_ACCIDENT_NAME,
DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_MS_USER_ID, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_KIND_OF_ACCIDENT
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = False

INSERT INTO MS_KIND_OF_ACCIDENT( KIND_OF_ACCIDENT_NAME , DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :KIND_OF_ACCIDENT_NAME , :DELETE_FLAG , :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID , :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_KIND_OF_ACCIDENT SET KIND_OF_ACCIDENT_NAME = :KIND_OF_ACCIDENT_NAME , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE KIND_OF_ACCIDENT_ID = :KIND_OF_ACCIDENT_ID
